name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drag & Drop Playlist Creator for YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make unlisted YouTube Playlists by dragging thumbnails into the sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▶️ Create unlisted playlists:
Click the extension button while browsing YouTube to open the drag and drop sidebar. Drag YouTube thumbnails into the box and click open playlist.
